body: Very sad stry.coz i dnt understns wht they say.translt to zimbabwe please

Before English translation turns up...

Basically a guy who take in his neighbours daughter whose mom is a trash as she always end up being locked out. The guy is an asshole himself as he start to take advantage of her and start fucking. Girl mom notice neighbour guy let her stay overnight she start to semi abandon her so the guy take care of her in exchange for sex, then when treating her reduced price Xmas cake, he saw her smiling for the first time. And then he wonder "if she was born in a normal family and not meeting a scum like him, would she always smile like this?"... Then he say "I am a scumbag, forgive me" and proceed to jackhammer her nonstop
Now that's kind of fuked up, sad story makes readers don't want to fap anymore
